newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Four Media Co.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Four Media Co.

text.p: -- Furman Selz said it initiated coverage of Four Media Co as a buy.
-- said set an 18-month price target of $14 a share. With acquisitions, the 18-month price target would be $17 a share.
-- said Four Media's shares are attractive at current levels.

-- Four Media provides post-production services. Furman Selz said financial pressure on major entertainment companies makes outsourcing of technical services appealling. Said Four Media offers "one-stop shopping."
-- said Four Media is in talks with more than a dozen acquisition candidates. Said growth through acquisition is fundamental to Four Media's strategy.
